== Jaunty Jackalope Release Party May 2nd 2009 ==

Party will be on May 2nd from 6:00pm till 9:00pm In the Corrales, NM Flying Star hospitality room. Thanks to Jim for getting it all reserved.<<BR>>
You darn right we'll have door prizes!
